title: SurveyRequestMessage
description:
SurveyRequestMessage is an XDR Struct defined as:

```text struct SurveyRequestMessage { NodeID surveyorPeerID; NodeID surveyedPeerID; uint32 ledgerNum; Curve25519Public encryptionKey; SurveyMessageCommandType commandType; }; ```

Curve25519Public.description:
Curve25519Public is an XDR Struct defined as:

```text struct Curve25519Public { opaque key[32]; }; ```

SurveyMessageCommandType.description:
SurveyMessageCommandType is an XDR Enum defined as:

```text enum SurveyMessageCommandType { TIME_SLICED_SURVEY_TOPOLOGY = 1 }; ```
